mapper.select:
SELECT SUM (数量) as 数量 , SUM (金额) as 金额 FROM cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(day,1,'${end}')
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
and 督导名称 in (${salesMan})
and 地区名称 in (${qy})
and 总监名称 in (${zj})
and 经理名称 in (${jl})
and 大类名称 in (${dl})

SELECT t1.[店铺], t1.[类别], t1.[销售数量], t1.销售金额, t2.销售金额 as 会员消费金额 FROM ( SELECT '总计' AS 店铺, DALEI.大类名称 as 类别, t6.销售数量, t6.销售金额 FROM ( SELECT cwbz_xsmx_hy.大类名称 AS 类别, ISNULL( SUM ( cwbz_xsmx_hy.数量 ), 0 ) AS 销售数量, ISNULL( SUM ( cwbz_xsmx_hy.金额 ), 0 ) AS 销售金额 FROM cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(day,1,'${end}')
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
and 督导名称 in (${salesMan})
and 地区名称 in (${qy})
and 总监名称 in (${zj})
and 经理名称 in (${jl})
and 大类名称 in (${dl})
group by cwbz_xsmx_hy.大类名称 ) as t6 RIGHT JOIN DALEI ON DALEI.[大类名称] = t6.类别) as t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 大类名称 AS 类别 , SUM (数量) AS 销售数量, SUM (金额) AS 销售金额 FROM cwbz_xsmx_hy WHERE LEN( [VIP卡号] ) > 0 and 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(day,1,'${end}')
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
and 督导名称 in (${salesMan})
and 地区名称 in (${qy})
and 总监名称 in (${zj})
and 经理名称 in (${jl})
and 大类名称 in (${dl})
GROUP BY 大类名称
) as t2 ON t1.类别 = t2.类别

select t1.地区名称 as 店铺, t1.大类名称 as 类别, floor(t1.数量) as 销售数量, floor(t1.金额) as 销售金额, floor(t3.会员总金额) as 会员消费金额, NULLIF(Round((CONVERT(float,t1.数量)/CONVERT(float,NULLIF(t2.总数量,0)))*100,2),'0') as 数量占比, NULLIF(Round((CONVERT(float,t1.金额)/CONVERT(float,NULLIF(t2.总金额,0)))*100,2),'0') as 金额占比, NULLIF(Round((CONVERT(float,t3.会员总金额)/CONVERT(float,NULLIF(t1.金额,0)))*100,2),'0') as 会员占比, NULLIF (Round(t1.金额/t1.数量,2),0) as 单价 from ( ( select 大类名称, 地区名称, floor(SUM(数量)) as 数量, floor(SUM(金额)) as 金额 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(day,1,'${end}')
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
and 督导名称 in (${salesMan})
and 地区名称 in (${qy})
and 总监名称 in (${zj})
and 经理名称 in (${jl})
and 大类名称 in (${dl})
group by 大类名称,地区名称) as t1 left join ( select 地区名称, SUM(数量) as 总数量, SUM(金额) as 总金额 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(day,1,'${end}')
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
and 督导名称 in (${salesMan})
and 地区名称 in (${qy})
and 总监名称 in (${zj})
and 经理名称 in (${jl})
and 大类名称 in (${dl})
group by 地区名称 ) as t2 on t1.地区名称 = t2.地区名称 left join( select 大类名称, 地区名称, SUM(数量) as 会员总数量, SUM(金额) as 会员总金额 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(day,1,'${end}') and len(VIP卡号)>0
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
and 督导名称 in (${salesMan})
and 地区名称 in (${qy})
and 总监名称 in (${zj})
and 经理名称 in (${jl})
and 大类名称 in (${dl})
group by 大类名称,地区名称 ) as t3 on t1.大类名称 = t3.大类名称 and t1.地区名称=t3.地区名称 ) order by t1.地区名称 , t1.大类名称
select * from cwbz_xsmx_hy;

select 地区名称 as 区域名称 from kehu where 1 = 1
and 地区名称 like '%${area}%'
group by 地区名称

SELECT RTRIM([大类名称]) FROM DALEI where 1 = 1
and 大类名称 = #{name}

select 小类名称 from xiaolei where 1 = 1
and 小类名称 = #{name}

select 商店名称 from kehu where 1 = 1
and 地区名称 in (${area})
and 总监名称 in (${zj})
and 经理名称 in (${jl})
and 督导名称 in (${salesMan})
and 商店名称 in (${shopName})
group by 商店名称

SELECT '汇总' as 地区名称,SUM (数量) as 数量 , SUM (金额) as 金额 FROM cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}' )
and 地区名称 in (${area})

SELECT '总计' AS 地区名称, DALEI.大类名称, ISNULL( t1.数量, 0 ) AS 数量, ISNULL( t1.金额, 0 ) AS 金额 FROM ( SELECT cwbz_xsmx_hy.大类名称 AS 大类名称, ISNULL( SUM ( cwbz_xsmx_hy.数量 ), 0 ) AS 数量, ISNULL( SUM ( cwbz_xsmx_hy.金额 ), 0 ) AS 金额 FROM cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}' )
and 地区名称 in (${area})
GROUP BY cwbz_xsmx_hy.大类名称 ) AS t1 RIGHT JOIN DALEI ON t1.大类名称 = DALEI.大类名称

SELECT t1.地区名称, t1.大类名称, t1.数量, t1.金额, t1.数量/t2.[数量] as 数量占比 , t1.金额/t2.[金额] as 金额占比 , t2.[数量] as 总数量, t2.[金额] as 总金额 FROM (SELECT 地区名称,大类名称, SUM (数量) AS 数量, SUM (金额) AS 金额 FROM cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}' )
and 地区名称 in (${area})
group by 大类名称 ,地区名称) as t1 LEFT JOIN (select 地区名称,nullif(sum(金额),0) as 金额,nullif( sum(数量),0)as 数量 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}' )
and 地区名称 in (${area}) GROUP BY 地区名称) as t2 on t1.地区名称 = t2.地区名称 ORDER BY t1.[地区名称],t1.[大类名称]

select nullif(sum(金额),0) as 金额,nullif( sum(数量),0)as 数量 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}')
and 地区名称 in (${area})

select * from (( select 商品代码, SUM(数量) as 数量 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}')
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
group by 商品代码 ) as t1 left join ( select 商品代码 as 库存商品代码, SUM(数量) as 库存数量 from cwbz_spkcb group by 商品代码 ) as t2 on t1.商品代码 = t2.库存商品代码 ) order by 数量 desc
select SUM(金额) from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}') 店铺代码 in ( select 店铺代码 from cwbz_mrkc)
select nullif (SUM(金额),0) from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}')

select sum(cwbz_xsmx_hy.数量) as 数量, cwbz_xsmx_hy.小类名称, sum(cwbz_xsmx_hy.金额) as 金额 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 1 = 1
and 小类名称 in (${stype})
and 地区名称 in (${areaParam})
and 总监名称 in (${zjParam})
and 经理名称 in (${jlParam})
and 督导名称 in (${salesManParam})
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
and 大类名称 in (${dalei})
group by cwbz_xsmx_hy.小类名称
select 小类名称 from xiaolei
select nullif(sum(数量),0) from cwbz_spkcb where 小类名称=#{sType};
select sum(金额) as 金额, month(日期) as 月份, count(店铺名称) as 店铺数量, sum(数量) as 总销数量 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where year(日期)=${year} group by month(日期)

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM cwbz_mrkc WHERE 类型= '店铺' AND YEAR (日期) = ${year} AND MONTH (日期) = ${month} AND DAY(日期) = (SELECT top 1 DAY(日期) FROM cwbz_mrkc WHERE 类型= '店铺' AND YEAR (日期) = ${year} AND MONTH (日期) =${month} ORDER BY DAY(日期) desc)

select sum(数量) from cwbz_mrkc where year(日期)=${year} and month(日期)=${month} AND DAY(日期) = (SELECT top 1 DAY(日期) FROM cwbz_mrkc WHERE YEAR (日期) = ${year} AND MONTH (日期) =${month} ORDER BY DAY(日期) desc)
select sum(数量) from cwbz_spkcb where 商品代码 = #{shopCode}

select cwbz_xsmx_hy.小类名称 as 小类名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.厂家 as 厂家, cwbz_xsmx_hy.商品代码 as 商品代码, cwbz_xsmx_hy.吊牌价 as 吊牌价, sum(cwbz_xsmx_hy.数量) as 销售数量 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}')
and 小类名称 in (${stype})
and 地区名称 in (${areaParam})
and 总监名称 in (${zjParam})
and 经理名称 in (${jlParam})
and 督导名称 in (${salesManParam})
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
and 大类名称 in (${dalei})
group by cwbz_xsmx_hy.小类名称,cwbz_xsmx_hy.厂家,cwbz_xsmx_hy.商品代码,cwbz_xsmx_hy.吊牌价 order by cwbz_xsmx_hy.小类名称

select t1.地区名称 as 区域名称, t1.督导名称 as 业务员名称, t1.店铺名称 as 仓库名称, t1.小类名称 as 小类名称, t1.数量 as 销售数量, t2.数量 as 库存数量 from (( select cwbz_xsmx_hy.地区名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.督导名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.店铺名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.小类名称, sum(cwbz_xsmx_hy.数量) as 数量, cwbz_xsmx_hy.店铺代码 from cwbz_xsmx_hy where 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}')
and 地区名称 in (${areaParam})
and 总监名称 in (${zjParam})
and 经理名称 in (${jlParam})
and 督导名称 in (${salesManParam})
and 店铺名称 in (${shopName})
group by cwbz_xsmx_hy.地区名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.督导名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.店铺名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.小类名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.店铺代码 ) t1 left join (SELECT 店铺代码,小类名称,SUM(数量) as 数量 FROM cwbz_spkcb GROUP BY 店铺代码,小类名称) as t2 on t1.店铺代码 = t2.店铺代码 and t1.[小类名称] = t2.[小类名称])
select count(0) from cwbz_xsmx_hy where between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}')

select SUM(t1.数量) as 销售数量, SUM(cwbz_spkcb.数量) as 库存数量 from (( select sum(cwbz_xsmx_hy.数量) as 数量, cwbz_xsmx_hy.店铺代码, cwbz_xsmx_hy.商品代码, cwbz_xsmx_hy.店铺名称 from cwbz_xsmx_hy WHERE 日期 between '${start}' and DATEADD(DAY,1,'${end}')
and 店铺名称 in (${area})
group by cwbz_xsmx_hy.数量, cwbz_xsmx_hy.店铺代码, cwbz_xsmx_hy.店铺名称, cwbz_xsmx_hy.商品代码 ) t1 left join cwbz_spkcb on t1.店铺代码 = cwbz_spkcb.店铺代码 and t1.商品代码 = cwbz_spkcb.商品代码)

SELECT A.商店名称 as 商店名称, SUM ( A.金额 ) AS 金额, ISNULL( C.对比金额, 0 ) AS 对比金额, SUM ( A.金额 ) - ISNULL( C.对比金额, 0 ) AS 百分比, D.商店名称 as 对比店铺 FROM QTLSDMX A FULL JOIN CWBZ_DB_KHDM B ON A.商店代码 = B.KHDM FULL JOIN DB_KEHU D ON D.商店代码 = B.DB_KHDM FULL JOIN ( SELECT SUM ( C.金额 ) AS 对比金额,商店名称,商店代码 FROM DBO.DB_QTLSDMX C WHERE SUBSTRING ( CONVERT ( CHAR, C.日期, 120 ), 1, 10 ) >= '${start}' AND SUBSTRING ( CONVERT ( CHAR, C.日期, 120 ), 1, 10 ) <= '${end}' GROUP BY 商店名称,商店代码 ) C ON B.DB_KHDM= C.商店代码 WHERE SUBSTRING ( CONVERT ( CHAR, A.日期, 120 ), 1, 10 ) >= '${start}' AND SUBSTRING ( CONVERT ( CHAR, A.日期, 120 ), 1, 10 ) <= '${end}'
AND A.商店名称 IN (${area})
GROUP BY A.商店名称, D.商店名称,对比金额 ORDER BY 金额 DESC
